testcase.name: Verify the signup to upskill elearning
testcase.system-out: Given Open the upskill elearning website....................................passed Given user should be on the main page.......................................passed When User clicks on SignUp link.............................................passed And Select Teach Course Radio button........................................passed And Enter mandatory details firstname "tomg", lastname "saha", e-mail "praksaha@in.ibm.com", Username "tomg", pass "Etihad@2021",Confirm password.passed And clicks on Register button...............................................passed Then Confirmation message will be populated in next screen and should have firstname "tomg" and lastname "saha".passed When User clicks on top right corner........................................passed Then Validate the email "praksaha@in.ibm.com"...............................passed When User navigates to Homepage.............................................passed And clicks on Compose.......................................................passed And Enter Send To "sneha"...................................................passed And Enter Subject...........................................................passed And Enter mail body.........................................................passed And Click on Send message...................................................passed Then Validate the acknowledgement...........................................passed
